thread.title: Donald Trump Will Host "Saturday Night Live"
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Will Host "Saturday Night Live"

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Donald Trump Will Host "Saturday Night Live"
text:
Donald Trump 's presidential campaign is heading full steam ahead towards Saturday Night Live .
The Republican candidate will host the November 7 episode of the NBC series, along with musical guest Sia.
Donald Trump returns to host #SNL November 7 with musical guest @Sia ! pic.twitter.com/kreVe6iSpD
â€” Saturday Night Live (@nbcsnl) October 13, 2015
 Trump actually hosted SNL once before back in 2004, at the height of his former series The Apprentice 's popularity. Last month, Trump hinted that he would be making a cameo on SNL at some point during the season.
His chief Democratic rival Hillary Clinton made a surprise appearance on SNL 's season 41 premiere on October 3 for a sketch with Kate McKinnon.
Saturday Night Live continues this weekend with host Tracy Morgan and musical guest Demi Lovato.
